name: gradient
brief:
HiGHS QP gradient maintenance

Incremental gradient updates for QP active set method.

algorithms.name: Incremental QP Gradient Update
algorithms.math:
Gradient ∇f(x) = Qx + c. After step x → x + αp:
      ∇f(x+αp) = Q(x+αp) + c = ∇f(x) + αQp.
      Update via SAXPY: gradient ← gradient + α·(Qp).
      Recompute periodically to prevent numerical drift.
algorithms.complexity: O(nnz(Q)) for full recompute. O(nnz(Qp)) per update.
